The claim made by Christine O: Donnell that New Castle County's unemployment rate had almost doubled in the last two years.
The response from Chris Coons: who questioned the accuracy of O'Donnell's claim and expressed doubt about where she obtained the numbers.
The request from moderator Wolf Blitzer: Donnell to provide the source of her statistics.
The analysis conducted by PolitiFact: which utilized the Local Area Unemployment Statistics database at the Bureau of Labor Statistics to verify the unemployment rates in New Castle County.
